title: A new Patch and more random Disconnects as usual
body:
Seriously Riot fix your crap.  Can we have just one patch without you breaking your game?


Always the same problem.  League constantly disconnects, but every other online app and service working perfectly fine with the only change being LoL updated.

getting disconnected 3-4 times every game.

It's pretty much unplayable at the moment.

replies.body:
Last game 3 of our tem had dc's during game, one of which constantly. This game i cant get past loading screen, i restarted it went repair, restarted aain went repair again, both tim4s no result. It bugsplats during loading and also te client just stops responding at various moment before/at/after launch/login today, constantly. 

Edit: Not only am i not getting past loading, now i cant even login; keep getting windows msg "lol client not responding" or a bugsplat or i press launch and it just dissappears forever or the client goes black. Have given up getting back ito game, hope rito will not send me a msg calling me "afk" now this got me so annoyed trying to get back in for last 20 mins.
This happened to 3 of us in a ranked match. The enemy team claimed they were DDOSing. We weren't even able to log back in until the match ended.

Just Got Booted from a ranked game where we were ahead big time and about to take dragon..
I keep trying to reconnect and nothing.. 
something is wrong i have never had this problem - with this game .. 
or any other game i own for that matter..
something is booting people off and not allowing them to get back into game..
its not my machine/internet - trust me on that one
Just got out of a game where 3 people on our team got kicked off. I haven't had a game that someone hasn't had to try logging back in

As of right now, we aren't seeing any widespread reports of connection issues in-game.  I am not completely ruling out the possibility that this is on our end, but I want to make sure that we explore some of the most common root causes as to why these disconnects are occurring.  Make sure that you complete all of the steps found in our [Connection Issues Article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).  There are a lot of steps there, but they are crucial in hopefully resolving this issue.

Let me know if you are still experiencing any issues!
